fi.left2die.ui
Class RadioButtonBox

java.lang.Object
  fi.left2die.gameobject.Entity
      fi.left2die.ui.RadioButtonBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameObject, Button.ButtonListener, java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
public class RadioButtonBox
extends Entity
implements IGameObject, Button.ButtonListener

UI-compent dialog with radio buttons and accept button. User interface component used with Slick2d library.

Author:
TeeMuki
